title: Trying to run a python 3.6 script with torch on a Ubuntu 16.04 x64 computer
body_html:
I am trying to run a Python 3.6 script with pytorch on a 64 bit Ubuntu 16.04 computer. My computer does not have a GPU. The torch imports seem to work ok but the kernel keeps dying all the time when I get to the part where torch libraries seems to being used. Does this seem like a PY3.6 or Torch or a no gpu issue and is there a work around. I am using the latest software for torch and pytorch.
Any suggestions would be appreciated

Clive
